metadata.description: 125 pages! Continuing the IDW series of books that reprint the very best TRANSFORMERS stories from the United Kingdom! Throwing the spotlight on their homeworld of CYBERTON, the AUTOBOTS and DECEPTICONS continue their bitter war. A rogue AUTOBOT from the planet's dark past resurfaces with a terrifying agenda while ULTRA MAGNUS finds his reception back home warmer than he ever imagined. Will CYBERTON and its cities burn?
metadata.name: The Transformers: Best of the UK - City of Fear
